div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1051 Mestia or Lantekhi raion (Svanetiia), (586, 1025 ?) Georgia, 1901-1904 Burial: 315-310 B.C. (Shelov) Contents: up to 34+ AV Panticapaeum: st. (as BMC 3) Disposition: Tiflis 3; Berlin 2; Munich 1 † Regling, ZfN 1931, pp. 34-8 Zograph, "Zolotye monety," 8-9 Pakhomov III, 700 † Kapanadze, in Problemy istorii Severnogo Pri- chernomor'ia v antichnuiu ėpokhy (Moscow, 1959), p. 143 Possibly 3 separate finds (of 21+, 10+, 3 coins), but probably a single deposit Lantekhi is sometimes spelled. Lentekhi
